scripts.dev: cd packages/lit-dev-content && (npm run build:ts:watch -- --preserveWatchOutput & npm run dev:build:site:watch & npm run dev:serve)
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && npm ci && lerna exec 'rm -rf node_modules' && lerna bootstrap --ci
scripts.upgrade: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && lerna exec 'rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json' && lerna bootstrap
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:links
scripts.test:links: npm run test:links:redirects && npm run test:links:internal && npm run test:links:external
